Address.Address1: No.1305 Kaixuan North Road, Putuo District

Description.Text: Yue hotel located at west of Shanghai, adjacent to Hongqiao Developing Area. Hotel is across from a modern business plaza with restaurants and shopping area. 3-minute walk to metro station for line 2, line 3 and line 13 and easy access to all tourist attractions. 45-minute drive from Pudong International Airport. 12-minute drive from Hongqiao International airport.
